caption.p: PCA and HCA performed on TPC and TEAC of essential oils. ( a) The PCA biplot of essential oils based on their TPC and TEAC; ( b) HCA dendrogram of essential oils based on their TPC and TEAC; ( c) The PCA biplot of essential oils based on their MICs and MBCs; ( d) HCA dendrogram of essential oils based on their MICs and MBCs. TPC—total phenolic content; TEAC—Trolox equivalent antioxidant capacity; MIC—minimum inhibitory concentration; MBC—minimum bactericidal concentration; LM— L. monocytogenes; SE— S. enteritidis.
